resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Hunting-horns concerts are planned. Hunting references are omnipresent on this poster.
resource.chars: Hunting-horns concerts are planned. Hunting references are omnipresent on this poster.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The Société Centrale pour l'Amélioration des Races de Chiens en France was a kennel club created in 1881 in Paris. For more details, see <a title="Société_Centrale_Canine" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soci%C3%A9t%C3%A9_Centrale_Canine" target="_blank" rel="noopener">the Wikipidea page of this society.
resource.chars: The Société Centrale pour l'Amélioration des Races de Chiens en France was a kennel club created in 1881 in Paris. For more details, see the Wikipidea page of this society.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: "Vénérie" or "chasse à courre" are a french word and a french phrase which mean "hunting with hounds". At the time, it was almost exclusively the prerogative of the aristocracy, by feudal tradition, because maintaining a pack of hounds is pricey, and because it requires horses.
resource.chars: "Vénérie" or "chasse à courre" are a french word and a french phrase which mean "hunting with hounds". At the time, it was almost exclusively the prerogative of the aristocracy, by feudal tradition, because maintaining a pack of hounds is pricey, and because it requires horses.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Even though this dog show mainly aims at the upper class, the entrance price is quite moderate.
resource.chars: Even though this dog show mainly aims at the upper class, the entrance price is quite moderate.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Alongside hunting dogs, the show also hosts a contest for "little luxury dogs kept on a leash by ladies", which confirms that this show aims at the upper classes. A gendered dimension can also be noted.
resource.chars: Alongside hunting dogs, the show also hosts a contest for "little luxury dogs kept on a leash by ladies", which confirms that this show aims at the upper classes. A gendered dimension can also be noted.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: "Chiens d'arrêt" means "pointing dogs". They are dogs mainly used for hunting.
resource.chars: "Chiens d'arrêt" means "pointing dogs". They are dogs mainly used for hunting.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Kennel clubs and dog selective breeding were previously experimented in the United Kingdom. For instance, The <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Kennel_Club" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Kennel Club, the oldest kennel club in the world, was founded in 1873.
resource.chars: Kennel clubs and dog selective breeding were previously experimented in the United Kingdom. For instance, The Kennel Club, the oldest kennel club in the world, was founded in 1873.
